attributes.action: illegalise companies use of peoples name & address for marketing purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: junk mail is an irritant. that little box on forms you tick for no marketing mail should be removed and use of customers names and addresses for that purpose should be made illegal. any company sending marketing mail via the postal service with a persons name and address should be fined that persons annual wage. i have noticed some companies tend to ignore the ticked box after a period of time and that is wrong. please stop the junk.
